channel.title: Pi little help pleas:) rep+
channel.description: how might i add a guy that will fix barrows pieces or statius, vesta, morrigan, or zuriel pieces???

item.title: Pi little help pleas:) rep+
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Something like this:

case NPC_ID:
    int[][] repairable_items = {{ITEM_ID, PRICE, NEW_ITEM}};
    for(int repair = 0; repair < repairable_items.length; repair++) {
        if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(repairable_items[repair][0]) {
            if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(repairable_items[repair][1]) {
                c.getItems().deleteItem(repairable_items[repair][0], 1);
                c.getItems().deleteItem(995, repairable_items[repair][1]);
                c.getItems().addItem(repairable_items[repair][2], 1);
                c.sendMessage("You have successfully repaired your armour.");
            } else {
                c.sendMessage("You do not have enough cash to repair that armour piece.");
                return;
            }
        } else {
            c.sendMessage("You don't have any repairable items at the moment.");
            return;
        }
    }
break;

Not sure if it works or not, just something I wrote really quickly.
If you use it, and it works, remember to give credits.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi little help pleas:) rep+
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

There are quite a few PI sources that already have the old man who fixes barrows, you could rip it from one of them and add the item ids of the broken armors to the input ids, and add the fixed armor ids to the output.

Read full topic
